alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 21 at 10:31AM MST until December 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 to 50 below zero. * WHERE...Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains, Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin, Lander Foothills and Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of snow today will bring a 1 to 2 inches of accumulation and create difficult travel conditions with snow and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin
